name: Archana Shaji
title: Embroidery Designer & Embroidery Manager
heroQuote: Embroidery is architecture made from thread, light, and patience — every stitch carries intention.
intro: I design and direct haute couture embroidery programs that balance experimental artistry with atelier execution discipline. With over a decade in the couture industry, I bridge the space between creative vision and production reality.
philosophy: I treat every panel as a composition of texture, density, and reflection — a conversation between material and light.
Luxury is communicated through restraint, consistency, and finishing details that reveal themselves only on closer inspection.
Management is a creative medium in itself: planning, sourcing, and handover quality shape the final garment as much as the stitch.
managementHighlights: Led multi-atelier embroidery production across couture and red-carpet timelines for international fashion houses.
Built technique documentation systems to improve repeatability, quality control, and artisan onboarding.
Directed sampling pipelines from concept drawing to final fitting approvals, reducing rework cycles by 40%.
Coordinated cross-cultural teams spanning Paris workshops and Mumbai embroidery ateliers.
